# TruffleHog Exclusions for XP2GDL90
# Paths to exclude from secret detection scanning

# Build directories
build/
build-debug/
build-release/
**/build/**

# SDK and dependencies
SDK/
Demo/
**/node_modules/**
**/.git/**

# Generated documentation
docs/generated/
**/doxygen/**

# Test files with mock data
tests/mocks/
**/*test*.json
**/*mock*.json

# Configuration files that may contain false positives
.clang-format
CMakeLists.txt
Doxyfile

# Known false positives (example patterns)
# Add specific patterns here if certain strings trigger false alarms
**/*example*
**/*sample*
**/*template*
